Articles.Content:
I think this should be doable in .22, maybe .23.

I'd like to keep the structural members stock if possible, welding permitted to keep the part count down. This is likely otherwise to run into thousands of parts.

For propulsion, I'd suggest the Luvodicus Super Atomic and some RCS. Maybe some flaps for control in atmosphere.

It is not necessary to orbit this thing in one piece, although I'd like to see it fully assembled (MechJeb Force Roll during docking works very well in .22 to align members).

Landing capability is also not required, although an external docking port for servicing would be nice. Crew of at least one.

I'll be starting the base section (wings and lower deck fuselage) today just to get some idea of the size.

Edited December 19, 2013 by ihtoit
fixed link
